post.summary: allocate a firewall
updates an image. if the image was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create an image. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

delete.summary: deletes an image and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates an ip. if the ip was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned
allocate an ip in the given network.
allocate a specific ip in the given network.
get all ips that match given properties
frees an ip
allocate a machine
find machines by multiple criteria
reports IPMI ip addresses leased by a management server for machines
returns machines including the ipmi connection data
register a machine
abort reinstall this machine
set the state of a chassis identify LED

get.summary: get the current machine provisioning event container

post.summary: adds a machine provisioning event
finalize the allocation of the machine by reconfiguring the switch, sent on successful image installation

get.summary: returns a machine including the ipmi connection data

post.summary: boots machine into BIOS on next reboot

parameters.description: reason why the chassis identify LED has been turned off
parameters.name: description

post.summary: sends a power-off to the chassis identify LED
sends a power-on to the chassis identify LED

parameters.description: reason why the chassis identify LED has been turned on
parameters.name: description

post.summary: sends a power-on to the chassis identify LED
sends a power-off to the machine
sends a power-on to the machine
sends a reset to the machine
reinstall this machine
set the state of a machine
updates a network. if the network was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a network. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: allocates a child network from a partition's private super network
get all networks that match given properties
free a network

delete.summary: deletes a network and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates a Partition. if the Partition was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a Partition. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

delete.summary: deletes a Partition and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: get all projects that match given properties
updates a size. if the size was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned

put.summary: create a size. if the given ID already exists a conflict is returned

post.summary: Searches all sizes for one to match the given hardwarespecs. If nothing is found, a list of entries is returned which describe the constraint which did not match

delete.summary: deletes an size and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: updates a switch. if the switch was changed since this one was read, a conflict is returned
register a switch

delete.summary: deletes an switch and returns the deleted entity

post.summary: notify the metal-api about a configuration change of a switch

get.summary: returns the current version information of this module

HMAC.description: Generate a 'Authorization: Metal xxxx' header where 'xxxx' is a HMAC generated by the Request-Date, the Request-Method and the Body
HMAC.name: Authorization

jwt.description: Add a 'Authorization: Bearer ....' header to the request
jwt.name: Authorization
